fields.name: Where do I recognize the name DanBob?
fields.value: Puzzled Pint, Boulder Trivia (former), Goofy French Bread pages at King Soopers (former), Boulder High in the 90s, CU in the 00s, Conference on World Affairs (volunteer)

fields.name: Promotion
fields.value: Buy Shadows over Loathing on Steam, or buy West of Loathing on Steam, Switch, GOG, etc.
